Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cunning Combo
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
Description.Desc: After using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, and her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> are enhanced, increasing the power of her bullets.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
Dodge: Speed Demon
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to dodge, then hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to reload while dodging, enhancing <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box
Description.Desc:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Dashes in the target direction and strikes nearby enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Vaults backward and launches a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Diverted Bombard
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box
Dash Attack: Do As I Please
Special Attack: Sugarcoated Bullet
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
A powerful ranged strike, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> down to charge up this attack, during which a small energy field is generated at the muzzle as Energy is consumed, dealing bonus DMG to enemies nearby.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet
Chain Attack: Ether Shellacking
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Ether Grenade
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When using this skill, other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in gains an additional 20 Energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Emergency Bombard
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back!
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Window of Opportunity
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge forward and bombard enemies, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back!

1031002.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please

1031004.Name: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet

1031006.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box (Scattered)

1031007.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box (Focused)

1031012.Name: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back!

Name: Core Passive: Mechanical Case
Additional Ability: Hare of Many Burrows
Desc: After hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, enhancing her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> for 3.5s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case</color> applies a debuff to an enemy, all squad members deal 25% more <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> to the target for 3.5s.

1.Name: Supercharged Bomb
1.Desc: The DMG and the Anomaly Buildup inflicted by Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases by 16%. For each additional 0.1s of charging when Nicole activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the duration of the energy field created at the target location increases by 0.15s
1.Desc2:
"I've juiced you all up! Go get 'em!"
"Huh? I-I wasn't slacking off, I swear  I just needed a break!"

2.Name: Charging Device
2.Desc: Nicole recovers 5 Energy when <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case's</color> debuff is triggered. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
2.Desc2:
"Never underestimate the value of a single second!"
"Do you have any idea how much extra I can squeeze out of just one second? It's unfathomable!"
"So, can I get a productivity bonus? How about 10%, huh?"

3.Name: A Hare's Cunning
3.Desc2: Without overpowering might or abundant resources, Nicole depended on her own sharp mind to bring the Cunning Hares to where they are today.

4.Name: Field Expansion
4.Desc: When Nicole uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the diameter of the energy field generated at the target location is increased by 3m.
4.Desc2:
"This, and this too  all of this will soon become the Cunning Hares' territory. Do you hear me!"
"WWhat? How soon?"
"Uh... in about ten thousand years, based on current revenue projections."

5.Name: Industry Star
5.Desc2: Though they have plenty of enemies in the industry, Nicole has led her team out of many impossible situations, and so their reputation and experience steadily grew.

6.Name: Corrupting Energy Field
6.Desc: When Nicole's energy fields deal DMG to an enemy, all squad member's CRIT Rate against that enemy increases by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
6.Desc2: A switch to higher quality ammo with better firepower and increased compressed Etheric Matter leads to higher damage, longer use duration... and higher costs.
